name: Corporate Law
description: Handles business formation, mergers, acquisitions, compliance, and corporate governance, ensuring that businesses operate within legal frameworks and adhere to regulations.

name: Personal Injury Law
description: Focuses on obtaining compensation for clients injured due to negligence or accidents, including claims for physical, emotional, and financial damages.

name: Immigration Law
description: Assists with visa applications, residency, citizenship processes, and legal status issues, helping clients navigate complex immigration laws and procedures.

name: Employment Law
description: Addresses workplace disputes, wrongful termination, labor rights, and employment contracts, ensuring fair treatment and adherence to employment regulations.

name: Intellectual Property Law
description: Protects creations of the mind such as trademarks, patents, and copyrights, safeguarding intellectual property rights and addressing infringement issues.

name: Tax Law
description: Involves tax planning, compliance, and dispute resolution, assisting clients with managing tax obligations and resolving issues with tax authorities.

name: Estate Planning

name: Contract Law
description: Deals with drafting, reviewing, and enforcing legal agreements, ensuring that contracts are clear, valid, and legally binding to prevent and resolve disputes.

name: Bankruptcy Law
description: Provides solutions for debt relief, bankruptcy filings, and restructuring, helping individuals and businesses navigate financial difficulties and manage insolvency issues.

name: Healthcare Law
description: Focuses on medical malpractice, patient rights, and regulatory compliance within the healthcare sector, ensuring adherence to legal standards and protecting patient interests.
